import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import SideMenu from './SideMenu' import TableOne from './TableOne' function Summary(props) { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { for (let i = 0; i < props.folders.length; i++) { for (let j = 0; j < props.folders[i].data.length; j++) { setProducts(props.folders[i].data[j]); } } }, []); console.log(products); return ( <>
{products.length ? (

} ) } export default Summary
